query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM leads) as lead_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tickets) as ticket_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM companies) as company_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM agents) as agent_count
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 385B8cqVvDyKYq8.2ff4d9bc4b3d --database HoXBpYBQ3qbVm6g7qLEzMx --execute SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM leads) as lead_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tickets) as ticket_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM companies) as company_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM agents) as agent_count
